short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your Rice Purity Test score

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick and easy Rice Purity Test calculator. Check your score instantly with this simple browser extension.

Detailed Description:
The Rice Purity Test Calculator is a simple browser extension that lets you quickly calculate your Rice Purity score. Features include:

• Instant score calculation
• Clean, user-friendly interface
• Works offline
• No registration needed
• Privacy focused - no data stored

Take the test anytime with just one click on the extension icon. Perfect for a quick self-assessment or fun with friends.

For the complete experience, visit ricepurity.me
